name: Mallikarjuna Maneri
title: Software Development Engineer
tagline: Building scalable web applications and robust automation frameworks

about.intro: Software Development Engineer with 2+ years of experience in building scalable web applications and automation frameworks using Java, Spring Boot, React.js, and Taiko.
about.details: Strong experience in RESTful API development, performance optimization, and automation testing. Proven ability to reduce manual testing efforts, improve system efficiency, and collaborate across teams in Agile environments. Passionate about delivering high-performance, customer-centric solutions for large-scale products.

education.institution: Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology
education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.subtitle: Automation Testing
experience.description: Developed a JavaScript-based automation testing framework using Taiko, reducing manual testing efforts by 30%. Improved cross-browser test coverage by 40% and reduced bug leakage by 25%.

experience.subtitle: Backend & Web Development
experience.description: Built and optimized RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and Angular for an online exam portal. Reduced API response times by 20% and improved admin efficiency by 15%.
